page.syntax: $if(expression as logical, valueTrue as any, valueFalse as any)

argument.name: expression
argument.description: A logical expression that evaluates to true or false.

argument.name: valueTrue
argument.description: The value to return if *[js:expression]* returns true.

argument.name: valueFalse
argument.description: The value to return if *[js:expression]* returns false.
